name: Tic Tac Toe V2
description:
TicTacToe – V2

I have remade my original game of TicTacToe.

Rules:

  • As RED (X) or BLUE (O), click on a tile to turn it yours.
  • You need three in a row to win in either direction: horizontal, vertical, or diagonal.
  • RED (X) will always have the first turn.

There is only single player.

Differences between versions:

  • Different engine
  • Smaller screen size
  • Better UI design
